TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Balung, title = Balung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balung} }

S.FORM: = Balung = Gaga mniq Tawyuensu Fusingcyu ka alang Balung. 82 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 225 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 73% niqan 165 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 27% niqan 60 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 70%, Amis 1%, Truku 0.4%, ni rahuq na o 1%. Pusu nniqan alang Alang Balung sun dha Balung, Barung ni Baling. Alang Balung nii o niqan tru klgan hangan saw daya Balung(Balong),kska Balung(Tayax),hunac Balung(Phay). Nniqan alang Paru alang Tawyuan nyusan Fusing alang Hwaling. Gasuc nniqan Gaga mniq daya hraan hidaw nsgan Fusing nyusan Fusing alang Hwaling sayang, mniq kska dgiyaq hraan hidaw Balung hiya. Tiri lnglingay Mniq kska dgiyaq hraan hidaw ka Balung, yabi 1160 dhuq 1220 knjisan ka dgiyaq dha. Pgkla patas Ciyawtung Mgrig rulu: Tduwa muda daya elug Tay7 mtmay alang dgiyaq nuysan Fusing, lutuc elug Balin Taw116 mtmay alang Balin. Ppanan rulu:Tduwa ppaun basu Tawyuan (Tasi-Rwofu-Balin)kika mtmay nuysan Fusing ka basu, dhuq saw bukuy bi Balin do kika tucing basu ni balay bi dhuq da. Sjiqan klgan nealang Atayal. Djiyun kari Kari Atayal ni Kari Tlu. Pnaah alang FImi Balung nii o qhuni hinoki, saw qhuni harung, niqan prngaw dha qhuni Tawmu uri, qnbhangan mu o snqsiya seuxal ka hini siida, hnici egu bi qhuni hinoki, kika angal dha sluun sapah, kiya ni pnaah hini ka hangan alang nii. Yasa kmlawa klwaan Nihung siida ka dgiyaq Balin mniq saw minkwo hngkawas dha pnhiyug dha spruq bali puniq hmtur seejiq alang, dhuq saw tgdha paru bi tnjiyal tnlangal klwaan siida ungac da, kiya ni tmhangan dha daka. Hangan Balung uri ka Balin nii, uxay uri o Malun ni Balin. Hunkawas 62 dgiyaq Takwan(dgiyaq Lala) yasa hjiyan egu bi paru pusu qhuni, kiya ni priyux miyah bi rmigaw seejiq nniqan. Mnhdu snluan ka elug beyhen do, egu bi smalu elug seejiq asi nniqan hini, kiya ni pusu pnhmaan dha o qlupas. Pgkla patas rmigaw Pqtaan mprigaw: ◎Qhjing Sinsing: Ini hari kmalu ka ppanan dha ni ini hari klaun seejiq uri, qhjing o kndadax ssiyaw dowras yayung Tahan suriq, ida egu balay ka qsiya. ◎Hakaw Barin: Yasa hnturan paru ddgiyaq, tgdha bling elug ni tgkingal elug bilng Balin o lutuc hakaw, naqah hari muda ka hiya ni kingal nanaq qntaan ka hiya. ◎Ida nkiya pqita paru bi pusu qhuni dgiyaq Takwan: Hangan Lalasan o Takwansan han ka hangan seuxal, kari Atayal o suyang bi qtaan, hngkawas 1975 tmhangan Takwansan ka kmlawa klwaan dha. Ungac brahan musa mrigaw ka hiya na, pusu wana bi tduwa saan qmita paru qhuni ka sayang, kana empusal dha paru qhuni o niqan kana ndaan ni tduwa rngaw, niqan patas spgan kana ka paru pusu qhuni hiya pgkla seejiq miyah rmigaw seejiq.

= Balong = Gaga mniq Tawyoenso Fosingcyo ka alang Balong. 82 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 225 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 73% niqan 165 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 27% niqan 60 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 70%, Amis 1%, Troko 0.4%, ni rahoq na o 1%. Poso nniqan alang Alang Balong son dha Balong, Barong ni Baling. Alang Balong nii o niqan tro klgan hangan saw daya Balong(Balong),kska Balong(Tayax),honac Balong(Phay). Nniqan alang Paro alang Tawyoan nyosan Fosing alang Hwaling. Gasoc nniqan Gaga mniq daya hraan hidaw nsgan Fosing nyosan Fosing alang Hwaling sayang, mniq kska dgiyaq hraan hidaw Balong hiya. Tiri lnglingay Mniq kska dgiyaq hraan hidaw ka Balong, yabi 1160 dhoq 1220 knjisan ka dgiyaq dha. Pgkla patas Ciyawtong Mgrig rolo: Tdowa moda daya elog Tay7 mtmay alang dgiyaq noysan Fosing, lotoc elog Balin Taw116 mtmay alang Balin. Ppanan rolo:Tdowa ppaon baso Tawyoan (Tasi-Rwofo-Balin)kika mtmay noysan Fosing ka baso, dhoq saw bokoy bi Balin do kika tocing baso ni balay bi dhoq da. Sjiqan klgan nealang Atayal. Djiyon kari Kari Atayal ni Kari Tlo. Pnaah alang FImi Balong nii o qhoni hinoki, saw qhoni harong, niqan prngaw dha qhoni Tawmo ori, qnbhangan mo o snqsiya seoxal ka hini siida, hnici ego bi qhoni hinoki, kika angal dha sloon sapah, kiya ni pnaah hini ka hangan alang nii. Yasa kmlawa klwaan Nihong siida ka dgiyaq Balin mniq saw minkwo hngkawas dha pnhiyog dha sproq bali poniq hmtor seejiq alang, dhoq saw tgdha paro bi tnjiyal tnlangal klwaan siida ongac da, kiya ni tmhangan dha daka. Hangan Balong ori ka Balin nii, oxay ori o Malon ni Balin. Honkawas 62 dgiyaq Takwan(dgiyaq Lala) yasa hjiyan ego bi paro poso qhoni, kiya ni priyox miyah bi rmigaw seejiq nniqan. Mnhdo snloan ka elog beyhen do, ego bi smalo elog seejiq asi nniqan hini, kiya ni poso pnhmaan dha o qlopas. Pgkla patas rmigaw Pqtaan mprigaw: ◎Qhjing Sinsing: Ini hari kmalo ka ppanan dha ni ini hari klaon seejiq ori, qhjing o kndadax ssiyaw dowras yayong Tahan soriq, ida ego balay ka qsiya. ◎Hakaw Barin: Yasa hntoran paro ddgiyaq, tgdha bling elog ni tgkingal elog bilng Balin o lotoc hakaw, naqah hari moda ka hiya ni kingal nanaq qntaan ka hiya. ◎Ida nkiya pqita paro bi poso qhoni dgiyaq Takwan: Hangan Lalasan o Takwansan han ka hangan seoxal, kari Atayal o soyang bi qtaan, hngkawas 1975 tmhangan Takwansan ka kmlawa klwaan dha. Ungac brahan mosa mrigaw ka hiya na, poso wana bi tdowa saan qmita paro qhoni ka sayang, kana emposal dha paro qhoni o niqan kana ndaan ni tdowa rngaw, niqan patas spgan kana ka paro poso qhoni hiya pgkla seejiq miyah rmigaw seejiq.
